Tools Data Visualisation

These visualisations are based on data generated due to interaction with tools section of the platform. They are mainly based on three metrics for each tool- total number of days accessed, average number of students in a day and average time spent by a student in a day.
  • average time spent on a tool by a student in a day - telangana
  • average number of students accessing tools in a day across - telangana
  • total number of days tools section of platform is accessed - telangana
  • average attendance for each tool - telangana
  • average time spent on a tool by a student in a day - rajasthan
  • average number of students accessing tools in a day across - rajasthan
  • total number of days tools section of platform is accessed - rajasthan
  • average attendance for each tool - rajasthan
  • average time spent on a tool by a student in a day - mizoram
  • average number of students accessing tools in a day across - mizoram
  • total number of days tools section of platform is accessed - mizoram
  • average attendance for each tool - mizoram
  • average time spent on a tool by a student in a day - chhattisgarh
  • average number of students accessing tools in a day across - chhattisgarh
  • total number of days tools section of platform is accessed - chhattisgarh
  • average attendance for each tool - chhattisgarh
  • average number of students accessing tools in a day - all schools
  • total number of days tools section of platform is accessed - all schools
  • average time spent on a tool by a student in a day - all schools
  • average attendance for each tool - all schools
